p: This retrospective cohort study included consecutive confirmed COVID-19 inpatients from Guanggu branch of Tongji Hospital, Tongji Medical College, Huazhong University of Science and Technology (Wuhan, China), a designated hospital for the treatment of COVID-19 patients. Patients were admitted from February 3, 2020 to February 26, 2020. SARS-CoV-2 infection was confirmed in all patients based on reverse transcription-polymerase chain reaction according to the criteria of the New Coronavirus Pneumonia Prevention and Control Program (5th edition) published by the National Health Commission of China [19]. Patients with diabetes were designated according to the patientâ€™s medical history. Then the patients without diabetes were matched (2:1 ratio) to the patients with diabetes based on age, sex, and comorbidities (hypertension, hyperlipemia, chronic renal diseases). The study was approved by the Ethics Committee of Tongji Hospital (TJ-IRB20200404). Written informed consent forms were waived in the urgency of pandemic.
